biotools.summary: an open-source, browser-based visualization suite to render complex relationships between cancer evolution data in an intuitive, interactive framework for biomedical investigators. It consists of 3 visualization tools: Timescape, Mapscape and Cellscape

bioschemas.name: E-scape
bioschemas.summary: an open-source, browser-based visualization suite to render complex relationships between cancer evolution data in an intuitive, interactive framework for biomedical investigators. It consists of 3 visualization tools: Timescape, Mapscape and Cellscape
